HomePage.title: British Ophthalmological Center
HomePage.description: Laser vision correction, treatment of cataract, retinal diseases and glaucoma – our mission, which we solve safely, professionally and effectively.
HomePage.slogan: Laser vision correction, treatment of cataract, retinal diseases and glaucoma – our mission, which we solve safely, professionally and effectively.
HomePage.modeRest: We work seven days a week
HomePage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for cataract treatment
HomePage.servicesTitle: Our ophthalmology clinic offers a full range of eye care services
HomePage.servicesText: Clients of the British Ophthalmology Center have access to all modern treatment methods, allowing them to effectively and safely address vision problems.
HomePage.advantagesSubtitle: Advantages of our ophthalmology clinic in Kyiv
HomePage.advantagesTitle: The specialists of our British Eye Clinic strive to give every patient the opportunity to see the world in all its brightness and clarity
HomePage.advantagesText: In our medical center, each patient is provided with a full range of ophthalmological services. The appointment is carried out by qualified doctors.
HomePage.choiceTitle: Choosing an eye clinic is important for everyone
HomePage.choiceText1: Many people don’t realize how important it is to have good vision. Usually, this only becomes clear once they face vision problems or deterioration themselves.
HomePage.choiceText2: Vision issues can appear at any age, so it’s crucial to see a specialist as soon as the first symptoms occur.
HomePage.choiceGreen: If you’ve been planning to undergo a full examination, now is the perfect time.
HomePage.approachTitle: We adhere to an individual approach: for some it is laser vision correction, for others it is conservative treatment.
HomePage.aboutTitle: “British Ophthalmology Center” combines professionalism and advanced technologies in caring for your vision
HomePage.aboutText1: From the very first day, our goal has been to provide patients with only the best that modern ophthalmology has to offer.
HomePage.aboutText2: Our mission is to help you in every possible way to keep your vision in perfect condition.
HomePage.aboutGreen: The clinic is accredited with the highest category and certified according to the <link>ISO 9001 valid since: 2015</link>.
HomePage.doctorsTitle: Our team consists of doctors and candidates of medical sciences, top-category specialists.
HomePage.doctorsText: Appointments are conducted by some of the best specialists in the field of ophthalmology, as confirmed by dozens of scientific publications and tens of thousands of surgeries performed!
HomePage.feedbacksTitle: What our patients say about us
HomePage.feedbacksText: Our center has performed over 1 million successful laser vision corrections and more than 5 million consultations.
HomePage.bookingTitle: Convenient booking and transparent consultation cost
HomePage.bookingText: We have made the process of contacting the clinic as simple as possible. You only need to book an appointment with an ophthalmologist in Kyiv online or by phone.
HomePage.upButtonHint: To the top of the page

AboutPage.title: About the Clinic
AboutPage.description: Since 2006, we have been restoring vision and a full life without glasses
AboutPage.aboutTitle: «British Ophthalmology Center» is an impeccable medical service with special attention to the control of the medical process.
AboutPage.aboutText1: From the very first day, our mission has been to provide patients with only the best that modern ophthalmology can offer. We employ some of the finest specialists in the field, proven by dozens of published scientific papers and tens of thousands of successful surgeries!
AboutPage.aboutText2: Our mission is to help you in every possible way to preserve your vision in perfect condition without surgical intervention. And if it ever happens that you do need surgery, we guarantee that it will be performed by some of the best specialists in ophthalmology!
AboutPage.aboutText3: The high qualifications of our specialists are achieved only through daily practice and continuous learning. A true doctor learns their profession throughout life, and our staff knows this well. We have every reason to be proud of our doctors.
AboutPage.germanText1: We are pleased to announce the opening of a new building of our center — a modern space created with one goal: to provide you with an even higher level of ophthalmologic care.
AboutPage.germanText2: The Medical Control Department is located in Germany, with treatment protocols strictly following German standards.
AboutPage.germanText3: We didn’t just open a new building — we created a space where every patient, from child to adult, receives maximum attention and care.
AboutPage.advantTitle: You can be confident in the quality of services provided at the British Ophthalmology Center
AboutPage.advantText: By choosing our clinic, you can always rely on professional and high-quality medical care.
AboutPage.ctaText: Book an eye examination to learn more about the condition of your visual system!
AboutPage.ctaTitle: Take care of your vision health today!
AboutPage.methodsTitle: We perform procedures using unique techniques
AboutPage.methodsGreen: For those who choose the best and accept no compromise
AboutPage.methodsText: Only we use the cold laser vision correction method, ensuring maximum safety for your eyes.
AboutPage.teamTitle: Our team of professionals treats the most complex eye diseases:
AboutPage.teamLi1: In cases of severe eye pathologies and injuries
AboutPage.teamLi2: When the problem cannot be solved by conservative methods
AboutPage.teamLi3: When laser vision correction is not possible for medical reasons

OffersPage.title: offers and discounts
OffersPage.description: Our clinic does not pay any fees to outside doctors for referring patients for surgical treatment

ServicesPage.title: Ophthalmology services
ServicesPage.description: The British Ophthalmology Center provides a full range of modern high-tech ophthalmological services for the treatment of eye diseases in people of all ages.
ServicesPage.sectionTitle: We diagnose all eye diseases and perform microsurgical treatment
ServicesPage.lazerCorectionMethodsTitle: Unique cold laser correction technology — only in our clinic
ServicesPage.doctorsText: Our doctors will carefully study the condition of your visual system and determine whether correction is possible in your case.
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsTitle: Revolutionary cataract treatment technologies — exclusively in our clinic
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsText: We use the most advanced phacoemulsification technique — the 'Water Flow', which is considered the 'gold standard' in modern ophthalmology.
ServicesPage.lazerEditionPriceText: The technique is selected after the examination, individually for you, to obtain the best result
ServicesPage.callUsText: If you have any questions, call our friendly call center or make an appointment for diagnostics with further consultation.
ServicesPage.catIndTitle: We treat cataracts in complex cases:
ServicesPage.catIndText: In our center, cataract surgeries are performed by surgeons with experience of at least 50,000 successful operations.
ServicesPage.catIndListItem3: we correct the consequences of unsuccessful surgeries in other clinics
ServicesPage.catIndListItem4: we take on the most difficult cases
ServicesPage.raynerCardTitle: We use only premium lenses (intraocular implants)
ServicesPage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for cataract treatment
ServicesPage.reynerItem1: developed with the involvement of artificial intelligence
ServicesPage.raynerAdv: Rayner GALAXY is now available for implantation in our clinic
ServicesPage.lansTitle: Who is recommended for refractive lens exchange:
ServicesPage.lansText1: The BiVision RLE procedure is most often recommended for people over 45 years old who begin to experience the first symptoms of age-related vision changes — blurred near vision, the need to move text further away, and rapid eye fatigue. Implanting a multifocal lens restores visual comfort and eliminates dependence on glasses.
ServicesPage.lansText2: In our center, refractive lens exchange surgeries are performed by surgeons with experience of no less than 50,000 successful procedures.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareText: Based on an innovative spiral optical design that provides clear vision at any distance and significantly reduces the risk of halos, glare, and blurriness.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareItem5: Natural image perception similar to a healthy human eye
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem1Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem2Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem3Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem4Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem5Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem6Text: Mostly contactless examination according to EU standards
ServicesPage.raynerAboutTitle: Rayner GALAXY — a new level of vision, available exclusively at our clinic
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText1: The innovative intraocular lens <link>Rayner GALAXY</link> is a premium solution for those who seek not only to remove cataracts but to restore youthful, clear, and comfortable vision without glasses.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText2: Rayner GALAXY represents next-generation intelligent technologies developed by the British company Rayner, one of the global leaders in ophthalmic surgery.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutItem: It is the world’s first intraocular lens developed with the involvement of artificial intelligence

PricePage.title: Prices
PricePage.paymentText: We strive to make our services more accessible. Now you have the option to pay for your treatment in installments, without extra financial burden.
PricePage.giftText: In our center you can buy a great gift for family, friends and colleagues

Contacts.text: You can make an appointment by filling out the form below.
Contacts.attention: Please note that Google Maps may show a route through military checkpoints with restricted access. We recommend setting your destination as Bessarabskiy Market — our center is located 100 m up Krutyi Uzviz from there.
Contacts.rulesAutoTitle: Vehicle access for patients with disabilities
Contacts.rulesAutoText: By prior arrangement with our Information and Registration Center, we allow vehicle access for visiting the clinic.
Contacts.rulesParkingText: Since the clinic is located in the very center of the city, in a historical building, parking near the clinic is prohibited.
